E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1990
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Randy Jones



Date: Sunday, 4/20/1990
Subject: Tom Candiotti healing process
Tom Candiotti is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 7 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Progress of Jose Cano
Dear Sir,
Jose Cano has an ERA of 3.26 at AA Hagerstown Suns!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director
